src:
Obral, Harga iPhone Dipangkas Rp 1 Jutaan
01 Nov 2019, 13:02 by Aisyah Kamaliah - detikInet


Suasana Indocomtech 2019. Foto: Aisyah Kamaliah/detikINET

Jakarta - Buat kalian yang berniat upgrade iPhone, bisa coba mengincar iPhone idaman dengan mengunjungi Indocomtech 2019. Seperti biasanya, ditawarkan diskon bervariasi berbagai tipe iPhone. Dalam program clearance sale iPhone yang digeber iBox di Indocomtech 2019, harga iPhone rata-rata dipangkas Rp 1 jutaan. Misalnya iPhone X 64 GB yang harganya semula Rp 17,5 juta menjadi Rp 16,5 juta. Selain diskonan, salah satu premium reseller Apple di Indonesia ini juga menawarkan cashback dengan nominal lumayan untuk produk selain iPhone seperti Apple Watch, iPad dan MacBook Pro.


Foto: iBox

Berikut ini adalah daftar lengkap diskon iPhone dalam program clearence sale, mulai dari iPhone 8 hingga iPhone XR: iPhone 8 64 GB Rp 10,5 juta dari Rp 11,5 jutaiPhone 8 256 GB Rp 13,5 juta dari Rp 14,5 jutaiPhone 8 Plus 64 GB Rp 12,5 juta dari Rp 13,5 jutaiPhone 8 Plus 256 GB Rp 15,5 juta dari Rp16,5 jutaiPhone X 64 GB Rp 16,5 juta dari Rp 17,5 jutaiPhone X 256 GB Rp 19,4 juta dari Rp 20,4 jutaiPhone XS 64 GB Rp 18 juta dari Rp 19,6 jutaiPhone XS 256 GB Rp 21 juta dari Rp 22,6 jutaiPhone XS 512 GB Rp 25 juta dari Rp 26,6 jutaiPhone XS Max 64 GB Rp 19,6 juta dari Rp 21,6 jutaiPhone XS Max 256 GB Rp 22,6juta dari Rp 24,6 jutaiPhone XS Max 512 GB Rp 26,6 juta dari Rp 28,6 jutaiPhone XR 64 GB Rp 12,6 juta dari Rp 14,7 jutaiPhone XR 128 GB Rp 13,6 juta dari Rp 15,7 jutaiPhone XR 256 GB Rp 15,6 juta dari Rp17,7 juta. Simak Video "Asyik! Apple TV+ Kini Sudah Bisa Dinikmati di Indonesia"[Gambas:Video 20detik](rns/rns)
text:
On sale, the price of the iPhone has been cut by Rp 1 million
01 Nov 2019, 13:02 by Aisyah Kamaliah - detikInet


Ambience of Indocomtech 2019. Photo: Aisyah Kamaliah / detikINET

Jakarta - For those of you who intend to upgrade your iPhone, you can try to target your ideal iPhone by visiting Indocomtech 2019. As usual, various discounts on various types of iPhone are offered. In the iPhone clearance sale program carried by iBox at Indocomtech 2019, the average iPhone price is cut at Rp 1 million. For example the iPhone X 64 GB, which originally cost Rp. 17.5 million to Rp. 16.5 million. In addition to discounts, one of Apple's premium resellers in Indonesia also offers a cashback with a fair amount for products other than iPhones such as Apple Watch, iPad and MacBook Pro.


Photo: iBox

The following is a complete list of iPhone discounts in the clearence sale program, ranging from the iPhone 8 to the iPhone XR: iPhone 8 64 GB Rp 10.5 million from Rp 11.5 million iPhone 8 256 GB Rp 13.5 million from Rp 14.5 million iPhone 8 Plus 64 GB Rp 12.5 million from Rp 13.5 million iPhone 8 Plus 256 GB Rp 15.5 million from Rp 16.5 million iPhone 64 64 million Rp 16.5 million from Rp 17.5 million iPhone X 256 GB Rp 19.4 million from Rp. 20.4 millionPhone XS 64GB Rp. 18 million from Rp. 19.6 millionPhone XS 256GB Rp. 21 million from Rp.22 million Rp. 512GB Rp. 25 million from Rp. 26.6 millionPhone XS Max 64GB Rp. million of Rp 21.6 million iPhone XS Max 256 GB Rp 22.6 million from Rp 24.6 million iPhone XS Max 512 GB Rp 26.6 million from Rp 28.6 million iPhone 64R Rp 12.6 million from Rp 14.7 million iPhone XR 128 GB Rp. 13.6 million from Rp. 15.7 millionPhone XR 256 GB Rp. 15.6 million from Rp. 17.7 million. Check out the video "Fun! Apple TV + Can Now Be Enjoyed in Indonesia" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (rns / rns)
